exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="gameover" width="640" height="1040" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="4P-1_png" x="0" y="0" width="640" height="1040"/>
	<e:Label id="myscore" text="0" x="251.5" y="462" textColor="0xff0000" size="40" verticalAlign="justify" width="89" height="40" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Image id="gamer" source="4P-2_png" x="36" y="752"/>
	<e:Image id="rank" source="rule_png" x="340.5" y="752"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="gamescene" width="640" height="1040" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="15e03df7c38"/>
	<e:Image id="bg" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" width="640" anchorOffsetY="0" height="1040" source="3P-1_jpg" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="bg2" source="3P-1_jpg" x="0" y="-1040" width="640" height="1040" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="gameM" source="3P-2_png" y="0" width="640" height="1040" x="0"/>
	<e:Label id="myscore" text="0" x="174.5" y="82" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" size="40" textColor="0xd81a1a"/>
	<e:Group id="gameMain" width="640" height="1040" x="0">
		<e:Image id="bird" source="3P-3_png" x="93" y="658" width="163" height="108"/>
		<e:Image source="3P-5_png" x="238.5" y="932" width="163" height="108"/>
		<e:Image source="3P-4_png" x="369.5" y="739.5" width="163" height="108"/>
		<e:Image source="3P-5_png" x="369.5" y="459" width="163" height="108"/>
		<e:Image source="3P-3_png" x="75.5" y="324" width="163" height="108"/>
		<e:Image source="3P-5_png" x="235" y="91" width="163" height="108"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="man" source="man_png" x="121" y="895" width="65" height="145" locked="true"/>
	<e:Group id="gameOver" width="640" height="1040" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" visible="false">
		<e:Image id="gameoverbg" source="4P-1_png" x="0" y="0"/>
		<e:Label id="gamescore" text="0" x="256" y="463" textColor="0xff0000" size="40" width="112" height="40" textAlign="center"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="starpage" width="640" height="1040" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="starpageA">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{starbtn}">
				<tween:To duration="1250" ease="bounceOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{26}" y="{790}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{rulebtn}">
				<tween:To duration="1250" ease="bounceOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{344}" y="{790}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{page1_1}">
				<tween:To duration="1250" ease="bounceOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object y="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="RuleA">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{rule}">
				<tween:To duration="1250" ease="bounceOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object y="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="RuleB">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{rule2}">
				<tween:To duration="1250" ease="bounceOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Image id="bg" source="1P-1_jpg" x="0" y="0" width="640" height="1040"/>
	<e:Image id="page1_1" source="1P-2_png" x="0" y="-520" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="starbtn" source="star_png" x="40" y="1040" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="rulebtn" source="rule_png" x="348" y="1040" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="rule" source="1P-2_jpg" x="0" y="-1040" width="640" height="1040"/>
	<e:Image id="rule2" source="6P-1_png" x="644" y="0" width="640" height="1040"/>
</e:Skin>
